verses.verse: Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> ye now what the YY <S%H3068><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8802><s%>; Arise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, contend <S%H7378><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thou before the mountains <S%H2022><s%>, and let the hills <S%H1389><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy voice <S%H6963><s%>.

Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> ye, O mountains <S%H2022><s%>, the YY'S <S%H3068><s%> controversy <S%H7379><s%>, and ye strong <S%H386><s%> foundations <S%H4146><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>: for the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath a controversy <S%H7379><s%> with his people <S%H5971><s%>, and he will plead <S%H3198><s%> <S%H8691><s%> with Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.
O my people <S%H5971><s%>, what have I done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto thee? and wherein have I wearied <S%H3811><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thee? testify <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8798><s%> against me.

For I brought thee up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8689><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and redeemed <S%H6299><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of servants <S%H5650><s%>; and I sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, Aharon <S%H175><s%>, and Miryam <S%H4813><s%>.

O my people <S%H5971><s%>, remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8798><s%> now what Balak <S%H1111><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> consulted <S%H3289><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and what Balaam <S%H1109><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Beor <S%H1160><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him from Shittim <S%H7851><s%> unto Gilgal <S%H1537><s%>; that ye may know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the righteousness <S%H6666><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

Wherewith shall I come before <S%H6923><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and bow <S%H3721><s%> <S%H8735><s%> myself before the high <S%H4791><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>? shall I come before <S%H6923><s%> <S%H8762><s%> him with burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%>, with calves <S%H5695><s%> of a year <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> ?

Will the YY <S%H3068><s%> be pleased <S%H7521><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with thousands <S%H505><s%> of rams <S%H352><s%>, or with ten thousands <S%H7233><s%> of rivers <S%H5158><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%>? shall I give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my firstborn <S%H1060><s%> for my transgression <S%H6588><s%>, the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of my body <S%H990><s%> for the sin <S%H2403><s%> of my soul <S%H5315><s%> ?

He hath shewed <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thee, O man <S%H120><s%>, what is good <S%H2896><s%>; and what doth the YY <S%H3068><s%> require <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of thee, but to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> justly <S%H4941><s%>, and to love <S%H160><s%> mercy <S%H2617><s%>, and to walk <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8800><s%> humbly <S%H6800><s%> <S%H8687><s%> with thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> ?

The YY'S <S%H3068><s%> voice <S%H6963><s%> crieth <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the city <S%H5892><s%>, and the man of wisdom <S%H8454><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy name <S%H8034><s%>: hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> ye the rod <S%H4294><s%>, and who hath appointed <S%H3259><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it.

Are there <S%H786><s%> yet the treasures <S%H214><s%> of wickedness <S%H7562><s%> <S%H8676><s%> <S%H376><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, and the scant <S%H7332><s%> measure <S%H374><s%> that is abominable <S%H2194><s%> <S%H8803><s%> ?
Shall I count them pure <S%H2135><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with the wicked <S%H7562><s%> balances <S%H3976><s%>, and with the bag <S%H3599><s%> of deceitful <S%H4820><s%> weights <S%H68><s%> ?

For the rich men <S%H6223><s%> thereof are full <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of violence <S%H2555><s%>, and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thereof have spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> lies <S%H8267><s%>, and their tongue <S%H3956><s%> is deceitful <S%H7423><s%> in their mouth <S%H6310><s%>.
Therefore also will I make thee sick <S%H2470><s%> <S%H8689><s%> in smiting <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8687><s%> thee, in making thee desolate <S%H8074><s%> <S%H8687><s%> because of thy sins <S%H2403><s%>.

Thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, but not be satisfied <S%H7646><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; and thy casting down <S%H3445><s%> shall be in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of thee; and thou shalt take hold <S%H5253><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, but shalt not deliver <S%H6403><s%> <S%H8686><s%>; and that which thou deliverest <S%H6403><s%> <S%H8762><s%> will I give up <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the sword <S%H2719><s%>.

Thou shalt sow <S%H2232><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, but thou shalt not reap <S%H7114><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; thou shalt tread <S%H1869><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the olives <S%H2132><s%>, but thou shalt not anoint <S%H5480><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee with oil <S%H8081><s%>; and sweet wine <S%H8492><s%>, but shalt not drink <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8799><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%>.

For the statutes <S%H2708><s%> of Omri <S%H6018><s%> are kept <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8691><s%>, and all the works <S%H4639><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Ach'av <S%H256><s%>, and ye walk <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in their counsels <S%H4156><s%>; that I should make <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> thee a desolation <S%H8047><s%>, and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thereof an hissing <S%H8322><s%>: therefore ye shall bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the reproach <S%H2781><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%>.
